title: House of Juice
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Juicery and brewery est. 2015 serving organic cold-pressed juices and smoothies along with freshly brewed ciders and probiotic soda like jun and kombucha. Offers superfood boosters and special drinks for nursing mothers. Uses ingredients from gardens in the city and grows some of its own produce. All vegan except for bee products on request.
